name: Club Sunrise
description:
A 2009 summer in Daybreak, the summer where 5 friends found a strange Sun sculpture which suddenly gave them Magic abilities.

Once finding the Sun, these 5 friends started a group they named Club Sunrise, but they quickly found out about a similar sculpture of a Moon a strange syndicate had found which the syndicate now plans to use to cause a sudden apocalypse.

Upon learning about their plans Club Sunrise decided they now must stop their new foes to save their neighborhood from a disastrous end. Find out how they did it in Club Sunrise!
